intro: Full throttle racing: no brakes, no mercy.
description:
Road Champions is a high-octane racing game where style meets speed. Tame the roads of the countryside, master the art of turbo boosting, and dominate a world built for speed and glory.
These modern champion riders charge through diverse tracks – be it dusty desert roads, ramshackle junkyards, or winding country lanes. Beat your opponents, compete in time trials, and participate in champion tournaments in single-player – or challenge a friend for a cutthroat couch multiplayer race!
Enjoy arcade car racing action with 16 upgradeable and customizable vehicles on 12 different racing tracks.
It is time to hit the gas!
Features
•	16 cars – Collect, upgrade, and customize your vehicles.
•	12 racing tracks – Rush through different environments.
•	A variety of boosts – Get an edge over your opponents! 
•	Choose your difficulty – Set your AI opponents’ skill to Easy, Medium, or Hard for a customizable challenge.
•	3 driver modes – Change your view to third-person, first-person, or close-up mode: what fits your racing style?
Game Modes
•	Tournament mode – Play multiple rounds against the same opponents. Collect points each round in Race, Elimination, or Time Trial modes.
•	Quick Race mode – Play a simple round on a chosen track against AI opponents.
•	Time Trial challenge – Beat set track times or your own best time.
•	Hotseat – Play against your friends for a round of split-screen multiplayer.
Earn your place among the Road Champions, where every race is a fight for glory and every second counts!
